caption:
“I saw eternity the other night.” — Henry Vaughan

Reflection:
Time dissolved into light, and the soul glimpsed home. Eternity is nearer than our breath, shimmering beyond the veil.

Commentary:
Vaughan’s vision invites us to see the eternal woven into the moment. Heaven is not distant — it pulses quietly within the now.
